author: ERIN DURKIN
title: De Blasio calls Trump a backstabbing hypocrite over resistance to local bailouts - POLITICO
description: In an interview with the New York Post, Trump expressed reluctance to use a new stimulus bill to aid the states hardest hit by the coronavirus crisis.
content:
New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio speaks at an event | AP Photo
Mayor Bill de Blasio said President Donald Trump seems to enjoy stabbing his home town in the back, after the president said hes not interested
 in bailing out Democratic states like New York.â€¦ [+3621 chars]
